name: vault-test
description:
After the blueprint changes to a RUNNING state, open up a terminal and run the following commands:

export VAULT_IP="@@{Vault.address[0]}@@"

curl --request PUT --data "{\
  \\"secret_shares\\": @@{secret_shares}@@,\
  \\"secret_threshold\\": @@{secret_threshold}@@\
}" "http://$VAULT_IP\:8200/v1/sys/init"

Your keys and root token will be returned, which should be saved in a safe place.   Then, from the Application Manage tab, run the "Unseal" action **@@{secret_threshold}@@** times, providing a unique key each time.
author: dev@emeagso.lab
